title: The Cardiac Lakers, the Church of Scottie Barnes, and More Early Season Story Lines We Love | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat start their NBA affirmations by discussing the new rule changes and how they are affecting refereeing around the league (1;00). Then they dissect the Lakers' entertaining fourth quarters (6:00) and wax poetic about Gary Payton II (14:00) and Evan Mobley (23:00). They wrap everything up by showing the Chicago Bulls some love (33:00) and sharing their thoughts on the blooming Cade Cunningham vs. Jalen Green rivalry (40:00) and the NBA's new generation.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Chris Sutton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: The Ringer
